title: Bug 2694 Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description:
Bug 2694 Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)

press 'Add' for the associated editors.

a. Multiple selection could be enabled.

b. The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked as '(default)' (similar to perspectives).

NOTES:
KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)
Also:

f. Need a width hint for the dialog.

g. Why does the File Editors Preference page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same?

I currently have fixes for a, c, f. Need to release.

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)
released fixes for a, c, f, g.
OB:
When pressing 'Add' for the associated editors, a hidden entry is added.

The 'Add' function allows selecting entries that already exist in the associated editors list.
EB:
When pressing 'Add' for the associated editors, no hidden entry should be added.

Entries already existing in the associated editors should not be available for selection.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
MA (09.08.2001 12:04:06)
1. Go to the preference page and navigate to Workbench > File Editors.
2. Without selecting anything from the 'Internal Editors' list, go to 'External Editors' and select an entry.
3. Switch back to 'Internal Editors' (Still no selection).
4. Press OK.

Expected result: The selected external editor should not be added.
